title: THE HAUNTING OF HILL HOUSE Ending & Ghosts Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: I'm not ashamed to admit that I may have cried several times during this show. That's a real horrific sight ladies and gentlemen.
The reveal of the bent neck lady was the greatest reveal in history
The actress who played Nellie might have the most incredibly expressive eyes that I've ever seen. Her work in episode five is Emmy worthy.
They all deserve an award: when they were all at Nellie's funeral there were no stops between scenes for 31 FREAKING MINUTES!!!

dont you guys think the casting was just perfect like the kid versions and the adult versions were so realistic and amazing . best horror tv show ever because of how they  dealt with fear guilt regret depression in the form of ghosts and the importance of family and love .
description:
We explain all the ending and all the ghosts found in Mike Flanagan's "The Haunting of Hill House".

Skip to Ending Explained:
